hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.
